name: Io
body:
<!DOCTYPE html>

<html lang="en">
<head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>Gao WebHost</title>
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <meta name="description" content="">
    <meta name="author" content="">
    <link rel="icon" type="image/ico" href="favicon.ico"/>

    <link href="lib/jqueryui/css/ui-lightness/jquery-ui-1.10.3.custom.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="bootstrap/less/bootstrap.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="lib/fontawesome/css/font-awesome.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="lib/spectrum/spectrum.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="lib/crsa/crsa.browser.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="lib/crsa/edit.css" rel="stylesheet">

    <script src="lib/less/less.js"></script>

    <script src="lib/jquery/jquery.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/jqueryui/js/jquery-ui-1.10.3.custom.js"></script>

    <script src="bootstrap/js/bootstrap.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/nestedSortable/jquery.mjs.nestedSortable.js"></script>



</head>

<body>



<script src="lib/crsa/css.helpers.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/crsa/crsa.select.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/crsa/crsa.undo.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/crsa/crsa.css.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/crsa/crsa.pages.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/crsa/crsa.storage.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/crsa/crsa.store.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/crsa/crsa.project.min.js"></script>

    <script src="lib/crsa/crsa.tree.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/crsa/app.explainer.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/crsa/crsa.tour.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/spectrum/spectrum.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/formathtml/formathtml.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/crsa/pinegrow.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/crsa/pg-parser.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/crsa/pg-query.min.js"></script>
    <script src="lib/crsa/crsa.edit.min.js"></script>

    <script src="frameworks/cssrules.js"></script>
    <script src="frameworks/html.js"></script>
    <script src="frameworks/bootstrap.3.3.1.js"></script>
    <script src="frameworks/foundation.5.4.5.js"></script>
    <script src="frameworks/960grid.js"></script>

    <script src="lib/crsa/crsa.min.js"></script>


    <script src="lib/ace/src-min-noconflict/ace.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>

       <script>
        var qs = (function(a) {
            if (a == "") return {};
            var b = {};
            for (var i = 0; i < a.length; ++i)
            {
                var p=a[i].split('=');
                if (p.length != 2) continue;
                b[p[0]] = decodeURIComponent(p[1].replace(/\+/g, " "));
            }
            return b;
        })(window.location.search.substr(1).split('&'));

        crsaProject = new CrsaProject();
        var d = {
            url : 'placeholders/',
            name : 'Sample assets',
            pages : []
        };
        for(var i = 1; i <= 9; i++) {
            d.pages.push({src: 'img' + i + '.jpg', image: 'img' + i + '.jpg'});
        }
        crsaProject.fromSimpleTemplate(d);

        window.crsaStorage = new CrsaLocalStorage();

        $(function() {

            var pages = [
            ];

            for(var i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
                var key = i == 0 ? 'page' : 'page' + i;
                var page = key in qs ? qs[key] : null;
                if(page) {
                    pages.push({name: 'Page', src: page})
                }
            }

            var examples = {
                url : 'templates/examples/',
                name : 'Bootstrap 3.3.1',
                pages : [
                    {src: 'new.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'starter-template.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'dashboard.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'jumbotron.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'jumbotron-narrow.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'justified-nav.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'navbar.html', tag: 'page'},
                    // {src: 'navbar-fixed-top.html', tag: 'page'},
                    //{src: 'navbar-static-top.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'non-responsive.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'offcanvas.html', tag: 'page'},
                    //{src: 'signin.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'grid.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'sticky-footer.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'sticky-footer-navbar.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'theme.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'carousel.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'cover.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'bootstrap', required: true, children:[
                        {src: 'css', required: true, children:[
                            {src: 'bootstrap.css', required: true},
                            {src: 'bootstrap.css.map', required: true},
                            {src: 'bootstrap.min.css', required: true},
                            {src: 'bootstrap-theme.css', required: true},
                            {src: 'bootstrap-theme.min.css', required: true}
                        ]},
                        {src: 'fonts', required: true, children:[
                            {src: 'glyphicons-halflings-regular.eot', required: true},
                            {src: 'glyphicons-halflings-regular.svg', required: true},
                            {src: 'glyphicons-halflings-regular.ttf', required: true},
                            {src: 'glyphicons-halflings-regular.woff', required: true}
                        ]},
                        {src: 'js', required: true, children:[
                            {src: 'bootstrap.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'bootstrap.min.js', required: true}
                        ]}
                    ]},
                    {src: 'assets', required: true, children:[
                        {src: 'js', required: true, children:[
                            {src: 'jquery.min.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'ie10-viewport-bug-workaround.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'retina.min.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'holder.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'holder.min.js', required: true}
                        ]}
                    ]}
                ]
            }

            var foundation = {
                url : 'templates/foundation/',
                name : 'Foundation 5.4.5',
                pages : [
                    {src: 'blank.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'branded.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'blog.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'feed.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'grid.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'orbit-home.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'banner-home.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'sidebar.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'contact.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'marketing.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'reality.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'so-boxy.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'store.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'workspace.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'img', required: true, children:[
                    ]},
                    {src: 'css', required: true, children:[
                        {src: 'foundation.css', required: true},
                        {src: 'foundation.min.css', required: true},
                        {src: 'normalize.css', required: true}
                    ]},
                    {src: 'js', required: true, children:[
                        {src: 'foundation.min.js', required: true},
                        {src: 'vendor', required: true, children:[
                            {src: 'fastclick.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'jquery.cookie.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'jquery.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'modernizr.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'placeholder.js', required: true}
                        ]}
                    ]}
                ]
            }

            var bootstrap2 = {
                url : 'templates/bootstrap2/',
                name : 'Bootstrap 2.3',
                frameworks : ['bs2.3.2'],
                pages : [
                  //  {src: 'new.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'starter-template.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'fluid.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'hero.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'justified-nav.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'signin.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'sticky-footer.html', tag: 'page'},
                 //   {src: 'sticky-footer-navbar.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'marketing-narrow.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'bootstrap', required: true, children:[
                        {src: 'css', required: true, children:[
                            {src: 'bootstrap.css', required: true},
                            {src: 'bootstrap.min.css', required: true},
                            {src: 'bootstrap-responsive.css', required: true},
                            {src: 'bootstrap-responsive.min.css', required: true}
                        ]},
                        {src: 'js', required: true, children:[
                            {src: 'bootstrap.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'bootstrap.min.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'jquery.js', required: true}
                        ]}
                    ]}
                ]
            }

            var html = {
                url : 'templates/html/',
                name : 'Plain HTML',
                pages : [
                    {src: 'new.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'css', required: true, children:[
                         {src: 'style.css', required: true}
                    ]}
                ]
            }

            var angular = {
                url : 'templates/angular/',
                name : 'AngularJS',
                pages : [
                    {src: 'todo.html', tag: 'page'},
                    {src: 'todo.js', required: true},
                    {src: 'angular.js', required: true},
                    {src: 'bootstrap', required: true, children:[
                        {src: 'css', required: true, children:[
                            {src: 'bootstrap.css', required: true}
                        ]},
                        {src: 'fonts', required: true, children:[
                            {src: 'glyphicons-halflings-regular.eot', required: true},
                            {src: 'glyphicons-halflings-regular.svg', required: true},
                            {src: 'glyphicons-halflings-regular.ttf', required: true},
                            {src: 'glyphicons-halflings-regular.woff', required: true}
                        ]},
                        {src: 'js', required: true, children:[
                            {src: 'bootstrap.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'bootstrap.min.js', required: true}
                        ]}
                    ]},
                    {src: 'assets', required: true, children:[
                        {src: 'js', required: true, children:[
                            {src: 'jquery.min.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'ie10-viewport-bug-workaround.js', required: true},
                            {src: 'retina.min.js', required: true}
                        ]}
                    ]}
                ]
            }


            $('body').crsa({
                pages : pages,
                templates : [examples, foundation, html, angular]
                //templates : [examples, foundation, bootstrap2, html]
            });

        });

        if(isApp()) {
        } else {
  (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
  })(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

  ga('create', 'UA-57858711-1', 'auto');
  ga('send', 'pageview');

        }
        gaSendPageView();

    </script>



</body></html>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
